response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value for us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. After careful consideration, we propose a price of $950,000 for this product. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we hope this offer reflects a fair compromise that allows both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
